section of a bundle is an ellipse). The exponential function

By interpolation, we predicted that a 1D

direct band gap. Additionally, we investigated the eﬀect of vdW
interactions between chains on the DFT-D3 energy correction.
DFT-D3 correction maintained the structures of V
and SCAC roughly, but the interchain distances were reduced.
Band gaps of few chain systems decrease as the number of
chains increases, with and without DFT-D3 correction, and
ﬁnally approach the band gaps of the bulk structure. The band
optimization retains the band structures of V
qualitatively; however, the band gaps were reduced by DFT-
D3 correction. The optimized structures and band gaps for
various numbers of chains of V
change the band structure of these 1D materials, nor does it
aﬀect the indirect-to-direct band gap transition, unlike in the
optoelectronic devices because it can absorb photon energy
without being disturbed by phonons. The charge mobility
is needed to determine whether there
are further applications for the ﬁeld eﬀect transistors that
require a direct band gap and appropriately fast mobility, as
The spin property of this 1D material is
also needed to be analyzed in future research. The 1D
materials have higher surface-to-volume ratios and no dangling
bonds, unlike the 2D materials; therefore, the 1D material
described in this study seems to be a promising material
